details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.5 Actions - 6.5.1 General - Action types
details.description: The Launch, Sound, Movie, ResetForm, ImportData, Hide, SetOCGState, Rendition, Trans, GoTo3DView and JavaScript actions shall not be permitted. Additionally, the deprecated set-state and noop actions shall not be permitted.
